name: Issac
body:
Doppelganger Issac

Medium monstrosity, neutral

Armor Class

17 (natural armor)

Hit Points

86

Speed

40ft

Damage Immunities

psychic

Condition Immunities

blinded, charmed

Senses

Darkvision 120ft, passive Perception 18

Languages

Common, Telepathy

Challenge

8 (3900 XP)

Shapechanger

Issac can use its action to polymorph into a Small, Medium or large humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Ambusher.

The doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised. Casting a cantrip or 1st level spell does not break stealth

Surprise Attack.

If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra (5d6) damage from the attack.

Actions

Multiattack.

The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

Slam.

Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Read Thoughts.

The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target.

Spellcasting(Psionics)

Issac is a 7th level caster DC17

Cantrips (at will5):

mage hand, prestidigitation, firebolt, minor illusion, friends

1st level (4 slots):

Comprehend Languages, Thunderwave, Silent Image, Charm Person

2nd level (3 slots):

Blur, Misty Step, Suggestion

3rd level (3 slots):

Fireball, Clairvoyance, Counterspell

4th level (1 slots):

Dimension Door
